attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Diep River Used Cars
attributes.description:
DEMO MODEL!!! ENQUIRE NOW and you will be connected to one of our professional sales executives who will gladly bring the vehicle out to you to test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. ENQUIRE NOW and we will tailor make a finance package that will not only suite your need but you pocket too as we deal through all major finance institutions and will fight for the best rate in town. ALL TRADE INS WELCOME AND WE OFFER NATIONWIDE DELIVERY
WHY FORD APPROVED
Our vehicles have a full-service history
None of our vehicles have been registered for more than 5 years old
Our vehicles have a maximum mileage of 120 000km
We get our cars’ mileage readings verified
Our vehicles come with the balance of Manufacturer’s Warranty - or a new warranty
The Balance of the Service Plan and Maintenance Plan is included
We offer Roadside Assistance for 12 months
We accept all trade-ins
We offer test drives on all our used vehicles

attributes.title: 2022 Renault Kwid 1.0 Dynamique Auto

attributes.description:
Volkswagen’s diminutive T-Cross is a favourable offering from the German giant, coming in at under 4 metres long, the T-Cross is a compact cross-over, with ease of motoring in mind. Equipped with a powerful, yet frugal 1.0 TSi engine, Volkswagen has managed to create a fantastic all-rounder, that is as happy trundling around town, as what it is traversing our beautiful country roads. As in typical Volkswagen fashion, the build quality is faultless and among the best in the business.

Balance of VW's 3 year / 120'000km warranty and a 3 year / 45'000Km service plan.

Don't Miss Out, Call Us Today, or Leave Your Details and We Will Call You.

Finance Can Be Arranged, Nationwide Delivery, Trade-ins Welcome, Full Service History at Agents.

Price Excludes Documentation and Registration Costs E&OE

As one of the many Motus Select Pre-owned dealerships, we pride ourselves in excellent service and offer vehicles that can be trusted and enjoyed. Customer satisfaction is our main priority! 

MOTUS: Live, Love, Drive.

attributes.description:
This 2021 MERCEDES-BENZ V250 D AVANTGARDE A/T is available on sale for R1,599,995 it has a AUTOMATIC transmission and is a perfect SUV for your daily driving pleasure. It has CREAM Interior and a beautiful BLACK colour. The vehicle has only driven 45000km and is still in great condition.
Extra Details Include:
   8-Seater Configuration, AMG Line, Panoramic Sunroof, Navigation, Touchpad, Parking Package with 360 Degree Camera, Blind Spot Assist, Mirror Package, Lane Keeping Assist, Towbar, Easy Pack Tailgate,19” Alloy Wheels !!!

2016 TOYOTA ETIOS, 149920 KM, SILVER with BLACK.

60007420

You should feel good with at least 75% of tire wear left on this set of rubber.
